text: The Eiger Sanction is a 1975 American action thriller movie directed by Clint Eastwood (who also stars) and was based on the 1972 novel of the same name by Trevanian. It also stars George Kennedy, Jean-Pierre Bernard, Vonetta McGee, Jack Cassidy, Thayer David, Gregory Walcott and Heidi Br√ºhl and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 action movies Category:1975 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American sports movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:1970s American action movies
title: The Eiger Sanction (movie)
